definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: haste, speed;—usually as adverb. acc. hastily, quickly: Jos 8:19, Jos 10:6, Jos 23:16 (all JE), Nu 17:11 (P), De 11:17, Ju Jdg 9:54, 2Sa 17:16, 2Sa 17:18, 2Sa 17:21, Je 27:16, Ec 8:l1 (in all these cases after vb.); before vb. (poet.) Is 5:26 (‖[[קַל]]), Ps 31:3, Ps 37:2, Is 58:8, Joe 4:4 (‖[[קַל]]); so also 1Sa 20:38 [[הוּשָׁה]] ´[[מ]] (cf. Dr); 2Ki 1:11 [[רֵָדָה]];—but perhaps rd. [[מַהֲרָה]], i.e. Pi. Imv. of [[מהר]] (cf. 1Sa 23:27); c. prep. (late): ´[[בִּמ]] in haste = quickly Ec 4:12; ´[[עַד־מ]] id. Ps 147:15.
